item.title: Running Pi-Hole on Raspberry Pi
item.description: Several years ago I bought Raspberry Pi 3. It was a nice toy, but it was very slow and almost impossible to use, so it didn’t stick. Recently I bought new Raspberry Pi 4 because it has much better hardware (especially 8GB RAM option).
